dc_title_s: Map showing the route by road & navigation for connecting the Atlantic & Pacific Oceans : to accompany S.J. Dawson's report of the red river expedition
dc_description_s: From: Report on the Exploration of the Country between Lake Superior and the Red River Settlement ... By S.J. Dawson, 1859.; Relief shown by hachures.; "Statement of distances by land and water, respectively, between Thunder Bay, Lake Superior, and Fort Langley, on Frazer's River."|26 x 62 centimeters|Scale [1:10,131,600]|General Map Collection
